long_description: An everyday hooded jacket with an urban look, the Patagonia Infurno insulated jacket for boys is a sturdy, water-resistant shell with insulated sleeves and a torso that's lined with thick fleece. Water- and wind-resistant nylon shell has a polyurethane coating and Durable Water Repellent finish. Warm, half-inch thick pile fleece lines the body and hood; 78% recycled, 80g Thermogreen polyester insulates the sleeves. Three-panel hood; full length center front zipper; internal chin guard; external snap closure storm flap; double-snap adjustable cuffs. Patch drop-in pockets with snap flap; side-entry handwarmer pockets; left chest zippered pocket. The Patagonia Infurno insulated jacket has a hand-me-down ID label.
